title: New: Labrador Van – Opal
content:
Labrador Van, a four piece from Vancouver show heaps of potential on new track, Opal.

A gritty two and a half minute number, drawing from the likes of Wavves yet with a more lovelorn attitude, it almost feels like an album opener, building the foundations for greater things to come. As the song crescendo’s in a mess of extravagant drums and scratchy guitar lines, it finishes, leaving the tantalizing feeling of forever craving more. Check out Opal below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
